root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into en
root.data: The fertility rate of adolescents é calculated as a ratio. The numerator é the number of live births for women between 15 and 19 years old and the denominator é the exposure estimate ç ã o à pregnancy of women between 15 and 19 years old. The calculation é the same for the 10 to 14 year old age group.
